overview: How does a young Bavarian suddenly, and radically change lives to become a shaman? The artist Natacha Nisic uses images and words to document the personal and spiritual revolution that compelled Andrea to visit South Korea in 2007, where Kim Keum-hwa, one of the most illustrious shamans in the country, would initiate her into the art of communicating with the spirit world.
title: Le Ciel d'Andrea
